description: These savoury Chinese scallion pancakes are perfect with your favourite dipping sauce like sweet chilli or hoi sin.
keywords: Savoury pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chinese Scallion Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 260g plain flour, plus extra for rolling

recipeInstructions.text: Place the flour, garlic powder and salt in a large bowl and pour in 180ml of boiling water. Mix well to form a dough, adding more hot water if necessary. Once cool enough to handle, knead on a floured work surface for 5 minutes. Place back in the bowl and cover. Rest for 30 minutes.

Cut the dough ball into 4 pieces. Roll each piece out into an 8 inch circle on a lightly floured work surface. Brush lightly with oil and sprinkle with spring onions. Roll up into a tight log and curl into a coil, tucking the edges in to seal. Flatten the coil with your hand and roll out into a thin disc with a rolling pin.
Repeat with the remaining dough and spring onions. Heat a large non-stick pan with oil and cook the pancakes for 2-3 minutes on each side until lightly golden and crisp.
